data.name: GACHI ADVENTURE: Billy's Legacy
data.detailed_description:
GACHI ADVENTURE: Billy's Legacy is a truly open-world role-playing game. You will find a variable plot with a unique atmosphere of Gachimuchi, a whole city available for free study and intense card battles. Find familiar characters, fight powerful opponents, write your own story in this wondrous and strange world.

Ent and history

A long time ago, BILLY HERRINGTON founded the city of SHINNIPPORI to end chaos and anarchy forever. Despite all the difficulties, this place flourished. Unfortunately, good times don't last forever and one day Billy disappeared without a trace. The power in the city was divided among many factions, which was the beginning of a bloody civil war.

You are an ordinary BOY who came to SHINNIPPORI in search of a better life. What's wrong with BILLY? Who will become the new ruler of the city? How will this adventure change your hero and the world around him? The answers to these questions will be given by the plot of the game.

Variability and the open world

During the passage, you will constantly have to make a choice that can change the direction of the story. Remember, your decisions have consequences for both your hero and other characters. The results of your actions will affect the state of the game world and the final ending.

SHINNIPPORI is divided into 6 districts, each of which has its own unique style and narrative. All of them contain a lot of interesting characters, quests and points of interest. You will be able to thoroughly study each of them.

Factions of the game

Three main factions are fighting for power in the city. You can either help them settle permanently in SHINNIPPORI, or destroy them forever.

Combat system

The combat system is a card-based butler inspired by Slay the spire. You have to collect your own unique deck of cards to test it in a tough battle. Test your tactical abilities for strength.

You chose the right DOOR, BOY!

Forward to an unforgettable adventure in GACHI ADVENTURE: Billy's Legacy
